tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    behavior_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE user_demographics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clicks INT,
    views INT,
    purchases INT,
    time_spent FLOAT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_demographics (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_behavior (
  user_id INT,
  behavior_type VARCHAR(20),
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_demographics(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_demographics (
    user_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    interests TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
